word: Through faith all may receive much, if they will open the windows of the soul heavenward to let the Sun of Righteousness shine in. . . . We are to accept the ways and works of God through whomsoever He shall send them. We are to follow humbly in the way of the Lord. The way to evidence to the world that we are Christ's followers is to manifest unselfish love for one another, not seeking the supremacy. . . .
